description: Prune 1-100 messages. You can use filters
extended:
You can apply filters. Possible filters are:
`@Mention/User ID` - Only delete messages by this member
`Links` - Only delete links
`Attachments` - Only delete attachments
`Bots` - Only delete messages by bots
`Invites` - Only delete instant invites
`Emojis` - Only delete emojis
`Mentions` - Only delete mentions
usage: <Amount> [@Mention | User-ID | Links | Attachments | Bots | Invites | Emojis | Mentions]
NO_AMOUNT: Please provide an amount between 1 and 100
NO_MESSAGES: I was not able to fetch any messages. Make sure I have permission to read message history!
SUCCESS: I successfully deleted {AMOUNT} messages matching your filter!
